data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Klaipedos, Lithuania, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Klaipedos, Lithuania
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 4,659 believers in the state of Klaipedos to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Klaipedos, Lithuania.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Klaipedos, Lithuania.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Uzbek, Northern people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, the the state of Klaipedos will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Klaipedos, Lithuania. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Klaipedos, Lithuania with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

location.name: Klaipedos
